forum.content:
A soft sound 柔軟的聲音

To the way that she wears her hair down 以她穿著頭髮的方式

Covering up her face. 覆蓋她的臉。

And oh what a let down, 哦，什麼讓我失望，

And I don't seem to be having any effect now現在我似乎沒有任何影響

Falling all over the place. 落在整個地方。

But you're losing your words但你失去你的話

We're speaking in bodies 我們正在身體說話

Avoiding me and talking 'bout you.避免了我再跟你的思念。

But you're losing your turn但你失去輪到你

I guess I'll never learn我想我永远也学不会

'Cause I stay another hour or two. 因為我再呆一兩個小時。

For crying out loud, settle down! 為了大聲哭泣，安定下來！

You know I can't be found with you 你知道我找不到你

We get back to my house我们回到我的房子

Your hands, my mouth你的手，我的嘴

Now I just stop myself around you. 現在我只是停止在你身邊。

A small town 一個小鎮

Dictating all the people we get around 聽我們所有的人

What a familiar face. 一個熟悉的臉

Do you get what I mean now?你明白我的意思了？

I'm so fixated on the girl with the soft sound 我正在用柔軟的聲音固定在那個女孩身上

And hair all over the place. 頭髮遍布整個地方。

And you're sure that I'd learn而你知道，我会学习

I'm pushing through bodies 我正在推動身體

Avoiding me and walking 'round you.避开我，走遠你。

And you're cold and I burn 而且你很冷，我燃燒

I guess I'll never learn我想我永远也学不会

'Cause I stay another hour or two. 因為我再呆一兩個小時。

For crying out loud, settle down! 為了大聲哭泣，安定下來！

You know I can't be found with you 你知道我找不到你

We get back to my house我们回到我的房子

Your hands, my mouth你的手，我的嘴


Now I just stop myself around you. 現在我只是停止在你身邊。

For crying out loud! 大聲哭泣!

urls.description: Like this version a lot. So melancholic :) Majestic Casual - Experience music in a new way. https://
urls.title: The 1975 - Settle Down (Young Ruffian Remix)

forum.title: The1975-settle down
